about_the_game:
A major hurricane swept through the state, destroying most logistical points, including structures and transmission facilities.


Story:
A company for the restoration of infrastructure in emergency regions, has sent its best specialist, providing everything he needs to solve the task that has arisen.

Gameplay:
The player's main task is to restore the state of the area damaged by the hurricane, making everything work as it did before, or even better!


Overcoming:
During your journey, you might come across different types of terrain and natural obstacles. To overcome them, it's important to think about the suitability of your transportation. Some vehicles are better suited for certain obstacles than others due to their unique advantages and disadvantages.

Weather and Seasons:
In addition to weather features, the game world will feature changing seasons, ranging from spring to winter landscapes that change in real time. Like the weather, the seasons have their own degree of impact on the game world's surfaces, making it difficult to move your car.


Transportation:
Throughout gameplay, the car can be improved based on its unique characteristics!Upgrading the vehicle and driving skills is possible by increasing the driver's level. Get ready to take your driving to the next level!


Game Character:
As you level up your driver, your game character gains more skills and confidence in driving. So keep leveling up to improve your character's abilities! You'll also become better equipped to handle unexpected breakdowns in the absence of a repair shop.


Home Improvements:
At the start of the game, you'll have access to a base that can be upgraded both technically and visually to add all the necessary amenities for you and your car. You can improve your bed or add a refrigerator, while your car can have a second garage compartment or a technical compartment to accommodate more vehicles and refine them without leaving the garage.

Main features of the game:
  • Experience an open, seamless world where you can choose your own path!
  • Discover a variety of car types and classes, each with customized exteriors and technical tuning.
  • Embrace the changing weather and seasons, which will provide a new perspective on the world.
  • Navigate through complex landscapes and natural obstacles that may hinder your movement.
  • Monitor both your character and vehicle performance closely. Join us now and let's embark on this thrilling adventure together!
  • The dynamic world will add an extra dose of adrenaline to your driving experience.

name: Delivery Driver Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce gtx 1650 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5‑11320H / AMD Ryzen 5 5500U
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce rtx 3060 / Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Let's work together to rebuild the region's infrastructure and overcome the challenges left behind by the devastating hurricane. By doing so, we can create new opportunities in the world of Delivery Driver Service.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Czech, Japanese, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
